channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee, LLC -- McAfee Web Gateway (MWG)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee, LLC -- McAfee Web Gateway (MWG)

item.title: CVE-2019-3643|2024-09-16T17:49:16.217Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) earlier than 7.8.2.13 is vulnerable to a remote attacker exploiting CVE-2019-9511, potentially leading to a denial of service. This affects the scanning proxies.
